title.en: Shingeki no Kyojin - Hands on Me (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Shingeki no Kyojin dj - Hands on me

biography.en:
Author entry for the works by the Circle Zangiri

Zangiri is a joint work of [Giru](https://mangadex.org/author/e6d1f00f-4b3c-48c6-8989-4e4d6a4df942/giru-zangiri) and [Chiruchiru](https://mangadex.org/author/61e6f22a-e004-4c36-bfee-361d9e8f63de/sanzan-chiruchiru)
with Giru usually as Artist

Alternative Names: ちるちる, Sanzan, Chiru Chiru, Sanzan (Chiruchiru), Zangiri (Chiruchiru), 散々 (ちるちる), 散切 (ちるちる)

Circles:
- Sanzan (散々)
- [Zangiri](https://mangadex.org/author/2f288170-bd11-40e2-81f1-fc541a76070a/zangiri) (散切): joint with Giru

Birth Date: March 13
Zodiac: Pisces 

Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=29198)

Alternative Names: Hanafuda Terrorism (Kamichi Giru), Kamichigiru, Zangiri (Giru), 散切 (ぎる), 花札テロリズム (神地ぎる), 神地ぎる 

Circle: Hanafuda Terrorism
Artist: Hamichi Giru

Also known as

Circle: [Zangiri](https://mangadex.org/author/2f288170-bd11-40e2-81f1-fc541a76070a/zangiri)
(joint with Chiruchiru)
Artist: Giru

Birth Date: June 4
Zodiac: Gemini

Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=29203)
